reviewText:
Great compilation of vintage adult films. This collection includes many well known 'pornstars' that existed before the industry had started. In the birth of film, came the birth of adult and Stage films. This DVD captures the best of the beginning.

Very good picture quality.

I bought this DVD to add to my film collection.  I had the opportunity to see REAL burlesque at the "Follies" off Mission Street in San Francisco when I was a young man.  I also have a "Pin Up" model collection and Betty Page was one of my favorites.  The films have been restored and are fun to watch. No nudity so if you are looking for a "Porn Flick" then this is not what you want!  If you are a Betty Page Buff a Pin Up fan or love history then this is a great addition to any collection.
Movies are short clips, typical 50's vintage footage. Scratchy quality on several of the films.  NOT for the shy, bashful or under 21 age groups. Explicit at times.

If you love pin-up girls you will love this film. It Includes some of the best footage of Betty Page, Janey Reynolds, Betty Rowland and more. Betty Page was the face of the sexy women until Marilyn Monroe showed up. You will not be disappointed. A2ZCDS did a great job on remastering and putting these clips together.
